column4: Is there a way I can install i386 deb packages in amd64 Ubuntu? I tried to compile the source code but it cant compile for amd64
Yes, but you can badly break the packaging system by forcing a package.  What are you trying to install?
Run `dpkg --force-help` and notice the blurb about forcing architecture.
And you'll probably need a bunch of lib32* packages for the audio and video.  apt-cache search lib32 | grep ^lib32
